page.title: 06A FAMILY WEEKEND
page.content: After half an hour we were on the M25.After an hour we were at Hall Place we left the girls there.Then my mum asked if we could go to Ruxley Nursery to look for a weeping rose bush.At Ruxley Manor Nursery we found a parking space.Once inside we looked for the roses.Soon we found them but they were only standard.My dad said"Lets try one more nursery."The last one we tried was next to Ravenswood school.We went in and looked around.I said to my dad"Please may I go and see the pets? "Of course you can" Dad answered.I saw a variety of budgies and canaries.I also saw 2 Canadian makaws which cost 180 pounds each.I looked at some Japanese Koi on my way out to look for my mum and dad. I found them talking to a steward.I heard my mum say to him" We'll take that home.
